mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrBnef Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ BNEF_SN , BNEF_SECT_CD , BNEF_DETAIL_SECT_CD , BNEF_NM , BNEF_BEG_DT , BNEF_END_DT , APRV_SECT_CD , APRV_ADMIN_ID , APRV_DT , STPGE_ADMIN_ID , STPGE_DT , STPGE_RESN_CONT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM MBR_BNEF WHERE 1 = 1 AND BNEF_SN = #{bnefSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteMbrBnef Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM MBR_BNEF WHERE 1 = 1 AND BNEF_SN = #{bnefSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
